original_text: So he went and got them and brought them to his mother, and she prepared some tasty food, just the way his father liked it.
korean_text: 그가 가서 끌어다가 어머니에게로 가져왔더니 그의 어머니가 그의 아버지가 즐기는 별미를 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: So he went and got them
and brought them to his mother
and she prepared some tasty food
just the way his father liked it
